reviewHighlights.text: Another buggy game from the assett-flippers Atomic Fabrik. Gameplay-video: https://youtu.be/SDatSTBWGxA
Aircraft Pushback Simulator Positives: + Ok idea + Somehow quite relaxing to play + Acceptable retro graphics Negatives: - Only 8 short levels - No va...
